title.name: LAST FRONTIER
title.subtitle: YEAR 2746
title.controls: ARROWS/WASD: Move  |  SPACE: Shoot  |  P: Pause

crawl: supplied resources, and kept the shipping lanes safe.
Then, without warning, they seized power.
Overnight, trade hubs became military outposts.
Those that didn't were told to be grateful.
bossChoice: You've proven yourself, Cole. I could use someone like you. The Syndicate could give you everything — power, freedom, purpose. Or you can keep fighting for people who will never know your name. What do you say?

join.title: YOU JOINED THE SYNDICATE
lines: Cole holstered his weapon and took the hand offered.
His wingmen never heard from him again.

fight.title: THE SYNDICATE FALLS
lines: The Syndicate crumbled without its leader.
The wingmen were reassigned. Just another rotation.
And Cole? He just kept flying.
